channel.title: Writing on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: Journaling as Thinking
item.description: Journaling doesn’t just mean recording your life for when you become super famous, you can accomplish a lot of different things by journaling. Sure, you absolutely can create a record for yourself and your family (and future biographers). You might instead want to get the neurotic and depressed thoughts out of your head and onto paper so that you can get on with business. Or perhaps you want to reinforce habits, like being grateful or generating ideas.
